mapper.select: SELECT p.postCategory, p.postTitle, p.PostLikes, p.PostNo, u.userId, u.userNickname, u.userProfile, (SELECT po.photoUrl FROM PHOTO po WHERE po.postno=p.postno AND ROWNUM = 1) photoUrl FROM POST p, PHOTO po, USERS u WHERE p.userNo=u.userNo AND p.postNo=po.postNo And USERID = #{userId} ORDER BY postNo DESC
select s.*,p.*,u.* from story s LEFT OUTER JOIN post p on s.sNO = p.sNO LEFT OUTER JOIN users u on u.userNO = p.userNo WHERE USERID = #{userId}
select photoURL,photoNo from photo where postno in (select postno from post where sno= #{value})
